metadata.title: CVE-2020-27773 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in MagickCore/gem-private.h. An attackerwho submits a crafted file that is processed by ImageMagick could triggerundefined behavior in the form of values outside the range of type`unsigned char` or division by zero. This would most likely lead to animpact to application availability, but could potentially cause otherproblems related to undefined behavior. This flaw affects ImageMagickversions prior to 7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
